name: Akshat Jangid
bio: I am a passionate and goal-driven Data Science and AI enthusiast with a strong foundation in data analysis, machine learning, and model deployment. My journey has been shaped by hands-on experience in building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems. I am deeply interested in extracting meaningful insights from data and transforming them into actionable solutions that add value to business and society.

projects.title: AgriSmart : AI Partner for every farmer
projects.description: Developed a web application that recommends suitable crops based on soil and weather data using a Random Forest model, and detects plant leaf diseases via a CNN-based deep learning model with treatment suggestions in English and Hindi. Deployed on Render with optimized model loading and performance handling.

projects.title: Customer Satisfaction Prediction
projects.description: Built a logistic regression model to predict airline passenger satisfaction using survey data. Implemented feature engineering, preprocessing, model evaluation, and deployed using Streamlit.
